title: Export Multiple Masters Files
content:
Hi!  
Anybody knows how to export different fonts (name\_of\_font roman; name\_of\_font roman condensed; name\_of\_font extended; etc) through a multiple master file?

Thanks in advance.  
Joel Vilas Boas aka J85
author: J VILAS BOAS

comments.content:
Already answered by DSType!  
Thanks! ;)
